# Data Sources {.unnumbered}

------------------------------------------------------------------------

With technological advances in technology, access to data has increased by leaps and bounds, and this includes data available to the public for free download. Here is a curated list of public education data:

## Public education data

### Washington State

-   [Data & Reporting](https://www.k12.wa.us/data-reporting)
-   [Data Portal](https://www.k12.wa.us/data-reporting/data-portal)
-   [Washington State Report Card](https://washingtonstatereportcard.ospi.k12.wa.us/)
-   [Data.WA.gov](https://data.wa.gov/)
-   [Report Card Spring Assessment Data from 2014-15 to 2021-22](https://data.wa.gov/education/Report-Card-Spring-Assessment-Data-from-2014-15-to/292v-tb9r)

### National

-   [National Center for Educational Statistics](https://nces.ed.gov/)
-   [U.S. Census Bureau - Education](https://www.census.gov/topics/education.html)

## Other public data

- [The General Social Survey (GSS)](https://gss.norc.org/)
- [International Consortium for Political and Social Research (ICPSR) ](https://www.icpsr.umich.edu/web/pages/index.html)
- [Pew Research Center](https://www.pewresearch.org/)
- [Data is Plural](https://www.data-is-plural.com/)
- [Tableau Public Gallery](https://public.tableau.com/app/discover)
